verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: has] attended an annual gala benefiting the Washington theater where Abraham Lincoln was assassinated .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] has [V: attended] [ARG1: an annual gala benefiting the Washington theater where Abraham Lincoln was assassinated] .
Melania Trump has attended [ARG0: an annual gala] [V: benefiting] [ARG1: the Washington theater where Abraham Lincoln was assassinated] .
Melania Trump has attended an annual gala benefiting the Washington theater where Abraham Lincoln [V: was] assassinated .
Melania Trump has attended an annual gala benefiting [ARGM-LOC: the Washington theater] [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG1: Abraham Lincoln] was [V: assassinated] .
